snippet: Garth Saloner said he did not want “a baseless and protracted lawsuit related to a contentious divorce” to hurt the school’s reputation.
abstract: Stanford Graduate School of Business dean Garth Saloner resigns over divorce lawsuit.
lead_paragraph: Garth Saloner said he did not want “a baseless and protracted lawsuit related to a contentious divorce” to hurt the school’s reputation.

headline.main: Stanford Business School Dean to Resign Over a Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Stanford Business School Dean to Resign Over a Lawsuit
